website_summaries.verdict: Tonka's tough, authentic-looking front loader comes with interactive sounds and flashing lights to keep kids entertained.
pros: Lights flash and engine revs when vehicle moves forward
Using the scoop activates hydraulic sounds
cons: Though it's a lot of fun for kids, it's definitely noisy for parents

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our toddler grandson. He would use it every day, but the noise.... I didn't expect it would be so loud. He loves it but it drives the adults crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Young

customer_reviews.title: 👎Garbage👎
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old and 4 year old boys broke this within a week..... didnt think it was possible. Wires everywhere and now it is trash👎
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy boy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled! A very happy boy on Christmas Day. What was especially nice is how amazon helped to make sure I received correct product with second shipment. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: chrisy

customer_reviews.title: kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yo son and daughter LOVE this toy and they have a number of construction vehicles for both indoor and outdoor play. It has been dropped off great heights without issue. My only wish is that the sound effects turned off every so often ... ours seems to keep going until the engine button is pressed a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Son loved that there were different sounds when driving in reverse vs forward. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Tonka
customer_reviews.text: Truly disappointing Tonka toy. They used to be known for high quality metal trucks. I will look for another brand like Hess Trucks in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lavelle

customer_reviews.title: Strong Truck
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this truck, it is built well and it is a good size
customer_reviews.author: Prez18

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, ships fast
customer_reviews.text: The shipment of this toy was very fast, I am impressed! I totally recommend it! My boy loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my three year old Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I got the plastic set the metal I will get when he is older.
customer_reviews.author: B. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my nephew for Christmas and he loved it. It's a great price, I've seen these at the stores for a higher price so I'm happy I ordered it here.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love a Tonka truck!!
customer_reviews.text: This made one little boy very, very happy Christmas morning! I didn’t realize it made sounds, but my nephew loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Tonka loader tractor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Tonka loader. Just wish the loader bucket was not made of plastic. The rest is all metal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Fun front loader
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his front loader. He plays with it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy and entertaining present,
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with the dump truck for my two yr old grandson. What a hit! He loves pushing it and it is sturdy enough to take it. The sounds are great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just EH
customer_reviews.text: This looked better o line than it actually is. The lights are a little strange looking and my son doesn’t love it.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMarlene

customer_reviews.title: Great nephew loved!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Product is sturdy. My great nephew loves the sounds and movements. It was a great buy for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: susan de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with all the bells & whistles... really sturdy and the sounds it makes is fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Angieann

customer_reviews.title: Loved the toy, it came broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my sons birthday. I put it away after buying it for a month before gifting it and when he inboxed it for his birthday it was broken and the return window had closed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Boy’s fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Grandso loved it uses it 2-3 hours a day. Great gift for any kid
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: happy kid
customer_reviews.text: You made a happy child with this product. he was digging up the backyard with the toy. thank u
customer_reviews.author: mrdrknoir

customer_reviews.title: nice toy seems to hold up
customer_reviews.text: nice toys for little boys my son is almost two and loves this and while it is plastic it has held up well
customer_reviews.author: abby houghton

customer_reviews.title: The Kid Has Spoken
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his construction vehicles like I love my coffee. This complements his collection well.
customer_reviews.author: VickyLynn

customer_reviews.title: 🚜🚜
customer_reviews.text: What fun for a little one who loves heavy equipment! My grandson is going to love this for Christmas! He's also getting the dump truck.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson who lives on the West Coast and I live on the East Coast loves this toy I purchased for him. When we FaceTime he shows me how he plays with it!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t function!
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews first . Some parts are sturdy but other parts are flimsy and unworkable. Doesn’t function 😞😞😞 Disappointed because he loves his Tonka steel Mighty Dump Tuck we bought him in May ! Now I am going to research the other Trucks made by Tonka and try to buy one that works properly and is going to last ! Don’t waist your money on this one 😞
customer_reviews.author: Santaclaus Northpole

customer_reviews.title: Corroded Batteries, Sound Never Worked!
customer_reviews.text: The batteries that are included leaked and corroded the battery insert. The truck didn’t even work when we cleaned it out and replaced it with new batteries. I expect much more out of a Tonka brand truck!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

product_meta.title: Tonka 8046 Power Movers Front Loader Toy Vehicle, Yellow
product_meta.description: With Tonka power movers, you take control! this rugged front loader features new motion drive technology allowing for fun and intuitive play that brings the action to life! with motion drive technology, push the vehicle forward to make the engine rev and activate the lights; push the vehicle backward to hear back-up sounds; work the front scoop to hear hydraulic sounds and flash the lights. The features activated by the child's interaction with the vehicle create an engaging and realistic, Tonka tough experience every time they play. Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Batteries included. Collect them all!.
feature_bullets: 12 inch Tonka front loader with lights & sounds
Move the truck forward for flashing lights and engine revving sound
Move the truck backwards for back up “beep-beep” sounds
Work the front scoop for hydraulic sounds.
Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Batteries included.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
